Due to the exceptional circumstances of the COVID-19 pandemic, WHO has published an updated the second edition of the IHR State Parties Self-Assessment Tool in December 2021 based on the first edition published in July 2018. SPAR questionaires for IHR Annual reporting are also updated and available at WHO e-SPAR database (https://extranet.who.int/e-spar/ )
